data.title: Pooja Sharma-Biography, Age, Height, Movie, Family, Net Worth
data.meta_description: Pooja Sharma is a versatile artist who has made a significant impact in the Nepalese film industry.
data.text:
Pooja Sharma is a versatile artist who has significantly impacted the Nepalese film industry. She is one of the most demanded Nepali actresses and Models in the Nepali Film industry. Her acting career began in 2012 A.D with a supporting role in “Three Lovers“, and since then, she has achieved remarkable success in various aspects of the industry. She is also the founder of TAG restaurant.

Age, Birthday and Zodiac

Pooja Sharma was born on April 30, 1992, A.D, in Sindhupalchowk, Nepal. As of 2023 A.D, she is 31 years old, and her zodiac sign is Scorpio.

Early Life and Education

Education

She completed her primary education at Shudesha School and then enrolled at United Academy. However, due to health issues, she had to shift to The National Campus, where she completed her high school education. Subsequently, she pursued higher education at the Kathmandu Academy of Tourism and Hospitality College (KATH), graduating with a Bachelor’s degree in Tourism.

Height and Weight

Physical Stats

She stands at a height of 5 feet 7 inches (170 cm) and weighs approximately 65 kg (143 lbs.). These physical attributes have contributed to her success as a model and actress in the entertainment industry.

Family Background

There is limited information about her family background. Her father is a doctor and her mother worked as a Teacher. When Pooja Sharma was very young, her parents got separated. She was raised by her mother, who played a significant role in shaping her life and career. She is an only child of her parents.

Personal Life and Relationship

Pooja Sharma and Yuddha Baniya were rumoured to be in a relationship after working together on the movie “Ajhai Pani“. Their relationship was confirmed when Pooja publicly announced her love for Yuddha Baniya. They have been featured in multiple movies together, including “Ma Yesto Geet Gauchu-2“. Pooja and Yuddha have been publicly communicating and expressing their thoughts towards each other on social media, making their relationship obvious to their followers. It is rumoured that they are getting married soon.

Career

Early Career and Rise to Fame

Pooja Sharma began her career in the entertainment industry as a model and through music videos. She made her acting debut in the Nepali movie “Three Lovers” in 2012, where she appeared in a supporting role. Her talent and dedication soon led her to the leading role in “Madhumash,” which marked a significant milestone in her career. However, it was her role in the movie “Prem Geet” that proved to be a turning point. The film, in which she co-starred with Pradeep Khadka, was a blockbuster at the box office and established her as a leading actress in the Nepalese film industry.

Notable Films and Achievements

Following the success of “Prem Geet,” Pooja Sharma continued to deliver outstanding performances in a series of successful films, including “Ma Yesto Geet Gauchhu,” “Ram Kahani,” “Samalinchha Kahile Man,” “Poi Paryo Kale,” “Ma Yesto Geet Gauchu-2,” and “Saamjhana Birsana.” Her dedication and versatility as an actress have earned her numerous accolades and recognition. She has been acclaimed with many national-level awards and has been titled the best actress for her remarkable performances.

Transition to Production and Singing

In addition to her acting career, Pooja Sharma made her debut as a producer with the movie “Ma Yesto Geet Gauchhu,” which was also a commercial success. She has also showcased her singing skills, receiving praise for her duet song with notable pop singer and musician Anil Singh.

Movies

Social Media

Pooja Sharma, the Nepalese actress and model, has a significant presence on social media platforms. She has 669 posts, 386K followers and 163 followers on Instagram, and 1.1M followers on Facebook as of December 2023 A.D.

Net Worth

Pooja‘s estimated net worth is roughly 1 crore as of December 2023 A.D. She normally charges around 5 to 15 lakhs per movie. She generates extra income from different commercial ad campaigns for various brands and products.
